targets.expr:
avg by (instance,state) (max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_connections{instance=~"$instance", state=~"current|available"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_connections{instance=~"$instance", state=~"current|available"}[5m]) or max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_connections{instance=~"$instance", state=~"current|available"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_connections{instance=~"$instance", state=~"current|available"}[5m]) or 
max_over_time(mongodb_connections{instance=~"$instance", state=~"current|available"}[$interval]) or 
max_over_time(mongodb_connections{instance=~"$instance", state=~"current|available"}[5m]))

panels.description: Average latency of operations (classified by read, write, or (other) command)
panels.title: Latency

panels.description: Ratio of index entries scanned or whole docs scanned / number of documents returned

targets.expr: avg by (instance) (rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{instance=~"$instance", state="scanned"}[$interval]) / ignoring(cl_id,rs_nm,rs_state,state) rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{instance=~"$instance", state="returned"}[$interval]) or (irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{instance=~"$instance", state="scanned"}[5m]) / ignoring(cl_id,rs_nm,rs_state,state) irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{instance=~"$instance", state="returned"}[5m])))

avg by (instance) (rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{instance=~"$instance", state="returned"}[$interval]) / ignoring(cl_id,rs_nm,rs_state,state) rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{instance=~"$instance", state="scanned_objects"}[$interval]) or
irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{instance=~"$instance", state="returned"}[5m]) / ignoring(cl_id,rs_nm,rs_state,state) irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{instance=~"$instance", state="scanned_objects"}[5m]))

panels.title: Scan Ratios

targets.expr: sum by (instance) (mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{instance=~"$instance", state=~"scanned_objects"}) / ignoring(state)sum by (instance) (mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{instance=~"$instance", state=~"scanned_objects|scanned"})

panels.description: Ops/sec (classified by (legacy) wire protocol request type)

targets.expr:
avg by (instance,type) (rate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_total{instance=~"$instance"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_total{instance=~"$instance"}[5m]) or 
rate(mongodb_mongos_op_counters_total{instance=~"$instance"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongos_op_counters_total{instance=~"$instance"}[5m]) or 
rate(mongodb_op_counters_total{instance=~"$instance"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_op_counters_total{instance=~"$instance"}[5m]))

panels.title: Requests

panels.description: Documents inserted/updated/deleted or returned per sec
panels.title: Document Operations

panels.description: The number of operations that are currently queued and waiting for a lock
panels.title: Queued Operations
